"This really pisses me off!": "Is is okay for me to have an outburst like this? It seems like it. No one knows who I am!"
"But more than that, it just makes me so angry!"
"Not being able to say what it is also pisses me off!"
"When you have a lot of stress how do you deal with it?"
"You really are serious about ARKS, aren't you?"
"You don't think focusing on fighting is a little too one sided? If that's what you like then I guess it's okay."
"A hobby? That sounds like a good idea."
"It guess it makes sense to get caught up in what you really like to do."
"Me? In this kind of situation I like to sing!"
"Don't worry I won't break out in to song here. I at least have that much common sense."
"But that kind of seems like fun! A sudden break out live out of no where! I might try it sometime!"
